channel.title: Posts on Simple admin blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Simple admin blog

item.title: docker-usefull-commands
item.description: Базовые команды Сборка образа Отладка Диски Сеть Управление контейнерами Управление Docker Machine [⬆] Базовые команды: Запуск контейнера в фоне [~]$ docker run -d nginx Запуск контейнера в интерактивном режиме с shell [~]$ docker run -it ubuntu bash Запуск контейнера удаляющегося после установки [~]$ docker run -rm ubuntu bash Экспорт порта контейнера [~]$ docker run -p 80:80 -d nginx Задать имя контейнера

item.title: ZFS
item.description: Table of Contents zfs-limits-without-reboot [⬆] zfs-limits-without-reboot: So how do we check what is currently used. cat /proc/spl/kstat/zfs/arcstats |grep c_ c_min 4 8449671168 c_max 4 26843545600 arc_no_grow 4 0 arc_tempreserve 4 0 arc_loaned_bytes 4 0 arc_prune 4 0 arc_meta_used 4 10379141352 arc_meta_limit 4 20132659200 arc_dnode_limit 4 2013265920 arc_meta_max 4 17284110848 arc_meta_min 4 16777216 sync_wait_for_async 4 1521310 arc_need_free 4 0 arc_sys_free 4 4224835584 The values c_min and c_max are in bytes and you can use the Bit calculator to translate into something more readable.

item.title: Linux System Administrator/DevOps Interview Questions
item.description: Linux System Administrator/DevOps Interview Questions Table of Contents General Questions Simple Linux Questions Medium Linux Questions Hard Linux Questions Expert Linux Questions Networking Questions MySQL Questions DevOps Questions Fun Questions Demo Time Other Great References [⬆] General Questions: What did you learn yesterday/this week? Talk about your preferred development/administration environment. (OS, Editor, Browsers, Tools etc.) Tell me about the last major Linux project you finished. Tell me about the biggest mistake you’ve made in [some recent time period] and how you would do it differently today.

item.title: Megacli64 RAID10 creation example
item.description: 1.Command syntax MegaCli -CfgLdAdd -rX [E0:S0,E1:S1,...] [WT|WB] [NORA|RA] [Direct|Cached] [CachedBadBBU|NoCachedBadBBU] [-szXXX [-szYYY ...]] [-strpszM] [-Hsp[E0:S0,...]] [-AfterLdX] | [FDE|CtrlBased] [-Default| -Automatic| -None| -Maximum| -MaximumWithoutCaching] [-Cache] [-enblPI] [-Force]-aN 2.Get adapter ID (it’s 0 in the example below), Enclosure ID, Slot ID: MegaCli64 -PDList -aALL | egrep 'Adapter|Enclosure|Slot' Adapter #0 Enclosure Device ID: 252 Slot Number: 0 Enclosure position: N/A Enclosure Device ID: 252 Slot Number: 1 Enclosure position: N/A Enclosure Device ID: 252 Slot Number: 2 Enclosure position: N/A Enclosure Device ID: 252 Slot Number: 3 Enclosure position: N/A Enclosure Device ID: 252 Slot Number: 4 Enclosure position: N/A Enclosure Device ID: 252 Slot Number: 5 Enclosure position: N/A In above example, we get

item.title: How to add disqus comments on your jekyll project
item.description: Add disqus in your jekyll project The first thing you need is register on https://disqus.com/ Add URL of your project to disqus here Find disqus code here Don’t forgot change your-url to your. Example: <div id="disqus_thread"></div> <script> /** * RECOMMENDED CONFIGURATION VARIABLES: EDIT AND UNCOMMENT THE SECTION BELOW TO INSERT DYNAMIC VALUES FROM YOUR PLATFORM OR CMS. * LEARN WHY DEFINING THESE VARIABLES IS IMPORTANT: https://disqus.

item.title: Mysql replication
item.description: Mysql replication Открываем в iptables порт 3306 на обоих серверах, можно открыть только для конкретного хоста. iptables -I INPUT -p tcp --dport 3306 -j ACCEPT По умолчанию уже включены бинлоги, если же нет производим: На сервере, который будет выступать мастером, необходимо внести правки в my.cnf: # выбираем ID сервера, произвольное число, лучше начинать с 1 server-id = 1 # путь к бинарному логу log_bin = /var/log/mysql/mysql-bin.log # название Вашей базы данных, которая будет реплицироваться binlog_do_db = newdatabase Перезапускаем Mysql:
